content: Immunization currently provides elements for information on the individual (practitioner) who performed the vaccination. I would expect to be also able to give information on which organization is responsible for administrating the vaccination. For example, sometimes it may not be known who performed the vaccination, especially when the primarySource of the Immunization is a patient and the vaccination happened abroad while the Organization may be know. Does anyone have an option about this?
Looks like an extension for now and possibly a tracker to add as a choice. Wait for the Immunization gurus to chime in
It could share a design with Procedure.
@Richard Townley-O'Neill that not a bad suggestion. I will make a tracker item for it.
